Package app.socket.unicast

Class USocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.socket.unicast.USocket
  • public class USocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a unicast socket to ease development

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  USocket.USocketPayload
      Represent the packet sent and received by the socket.

      (package private) static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Main static logger for class
      (package private) int TIMEOUT
      Constant time out for listening operation Standard value is 1000

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket​(java.lang.String content,
                       java.net.InetAddress addr,
                       int port)
        Sends a packet with String content to specific address and port
        Parameters:
        content - the content to be sent
        addr - the Address to be sent. In this assignment, LOCALHOST is being used
        port - the remote port to communicate with

      • receivePacket

        public USocket.USocketPayload receivePacket()
                                     throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:

        Throws:
